about_the_game:
Throne Lady just got a partner! Create savage and barbaric characters, color the skin, cover up with blood and filth, choose weapons, add various items, and send them to battle!
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.
External artwork by Ivanina Elena @art_zdesiseitsas.

Available categories:
- 12 bandana
- 16 beard
- 25 blood and paint
- 9 boots
- 2 hand positions for each arm equipable with 62 weapons
- 43 bracer
- 9 colorable hair
- 10 hair preset
- 6 crown
- 6 ear
- 12 eye
- 13 teeth
- 8 head detail
- 19 horns
- 3 filth
- 7 loin
- 4 necklace
- 11 pants
- 5 scarf
- 5 skirt item
- 12 skull
- 19 top
- 5 underwear
- 19 waist item
- 23 throne
- 5 aura
- 16 background
- 9 effects
- 2 floor
- 30 placable items
- 13 light

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1370 x 770 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1440 pixels or higher desktop resolution
